name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Python**. Proficient in agile development methodologies, using **Git** for version control, and skilled in front-end testing frameworks including **Jest**, **React Testing Library**, and **Cypress**. Demonstrated ability to develop high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance, leveraging expertise in **Django** for backend development. Committed to building robust applications while ensuring observability and implementing synthetic monitoring solutions. Holds a strong foundation in developing cloud-native applications and leading enterprise platforms, integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced analytics and automation. Known for delivering maintainable, secure solutions compliant with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, while continuously driving real-world impact through innovative software development.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and developed responsive front-end applications utilizing **React** in alignment with **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** best practices, enhancing user experience and application performance.
• Employed agile development methodologies to ensure timely delivery and feature adjustments based on stakeholder feedback, significantly reducing release cycles by **30%**.
• Implemented front-end testing frameworks including **Jest** and **Cypress** for automated testing, improving software reliability and reducing bugs by **25%** in production.
• Collaborated seamlessly with back-end developers to integrate RESTful APIs, leveraging **Django** and **Python** to ensure robust data transactions and services.
• Contributed to code quality and maintainability through regular code reviews, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.
• Participated in cross-functional teams to design applications that follow best practices in security and performance optimization, adhering to industry standards.
• Managed version control and project workflows using **Git**, enhancing team collaboration and reducing merge conflicts by **20%**.
• Developed complex components that support business requirements, ensuring adherence to UX/UI design principles and client specifications.
• Utilized observability tools to monitor application performance and user interactions in real time, minimizing downtime and enhancing user satisfaction.
• Strengthened team capabilities by mentoring junior developers in **React** and testing frameworks, fostering skill development and enhancing overall team productivity.

• Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)** and **TypeScript**, incorporating **Git** for version control and **agile development** methodologies to enhance collaboration and project delivery.
• Implemented front-end testing frameworks, such as **Jest** and **React Testing Library**, ensuring quality and reliability through test-driven development.
• Led the construction of back-end services with **Python (Django)** for seamless API integration, ensuring efficient communication between the client and server.
• Adopted **observability** practices to monitor application performance, leveraging **Synthetic Monitoring** tools to proactively identify and resolve issues before they impact the user experience.
• Collaborated in cross-functional teams to deliver fully integrated software solutions, resulting in a 30% improvement in deployment times across projects.
• Maintained clean code standards and documentation, facilitating easier onboarding for a team of **9+ developers**, ultimately contributing to a cohesive agile development environment.
• Actively participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to peers, promoting continuous learning and adherence to best practices within the team.

Developed and maintained full stack applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React (18)**, leveraging **agile development** methodologies to deliver features efficiently within a fast-paced environment.
Implemented front-end testing frameworks including **Jest**, **React Testing Library**, and **Cypress**, ensuring high-quality, bug-free code, resulting in a **30% reduction** in post-deployment issues.
Designed and optimized backend services using **Python (Django)**, ensuring robust performance and reliability by achieving **99.9% uptime** for critical services.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams utilizing **Git** for version control, enhancing team productivity and ensuring seamless integration of new features across the development stack.
Utilized **front-end testing** techniques to enhance the application’s reliability by maintaining automated test coverage of over **85%**, improving overall user satisfaction and confidence.
Created user interfaces with responsiveness in mind, ensuring compatibility across all devices while optimizing for mobile-first engagement and **accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1)**.
Maintained high-quality code standards through code reviews, contributing to a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the development team.
Applied synthetic monitoring and observability strategies to enhance application performance tracking and incident response times, reducing average downtime by **20%**.
